person.persName: John R. Grissom (Daviess Co, KY, tailor; Provost Marshal, 2nd Military District of Kentucky)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, tailor and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Augustus Grissom. Father of John R. Grissom, Jr. Tailor in Daviess County in 1860. Captain and provost marshal for the 2nd District of Kentucky from 1863 to 1865.
